n, m: nat

m + S n = S n + m

Qed.```

- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.

```coq
intros h st h' t es res.
destruct (handleAppendEntriesReply h st h' t es res) as [st' m] eqn:H.
split.
- apply handleAppendEntriesReply_type_term in H. destruct H as [H1 | [H2 | H3]]. apply H1. apply H2. apply H3.
- destruct H1 as [H11 H12].
  + destruct H11 as [H111 H112].
    * apply nextIndex_preserved in H112. destruct H112 as [H1121 H1122].
      apply H1121. apply H1122.
    * apply H112.
  + apply H11.
Qed.

original: intros h st h' t es res. destruct (handleAppendEntriesReply h st h' t es res) as [st' m] eqn:H. split. - apply handleAppendEntriesReply_type_term in H. destruct H as [H1 | [H2 | H3]]. apply H1. apply H2. apply H3. - destruct H1 as [H11 H12]. + destruct H11 as [H111 H112]. * apply nextIndex_preserved in H112. destruct H112 as [H1121 H1122]. apply H1121. apply H1122. * apply H112. + apply H11.
